ctl:test.name: wcs2:req10
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req10: All WCS request types shall be a subtype of RequestBase.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:req11
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req11: For all WCS request types, the request service parameter shall have a fixed value of 'WCS'.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:req12
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: req12: For all WCS request types, the request version parameter shall have a fixed value of '2.0.1'.

ctl:test.name: wcs2:post-xml-core-req10
